alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 3:11PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Natchitoches, Sabine Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and eastern Sabine Counties through 345 PM CST... At 311 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Converse to near Hemphill to near Farrsville. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, Zwolle, Hemphill, Converse, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Florien, Noble, Fisher, Robeline, Fairmount, Mount Carmel, Belmont, Negreet, Yellowpine, Columbus and Marthaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
